title: Drag and drop puzzle game
description: I am looking for someone to develop a drag and drop game to complete the picture. Game should be simple browser-based built using HTML, JS and PHP.
moreInfo: Flow of game: 1. Welcome screen displaying how to play the game 2. Game screen to play the game 3. Game must be finished in 30 seconds of time 4. There should be a hint section that shows which components are placed where. For every hint taken, 3seconds of time should get deducted. 5. After completing the game, a form should display on the screen where user has to feed his email and name 6. After that congratulation message will be displayed 7. User is able to see leaderboard as well

title: React Native developer for an ongoing project
description: We currently have a mobile application for emergencies. It has simple but vital functions. It is already completed and will go live soon. However, we will be adding new features and will need support when there is an issue. It is developed on React Native. Here are our requirements
moreInfo: 1. Expert knowledge in React Native 2. Good English for communication 3. Teams over individuals are preferred 4. I will give the full details to ONLY selected freelancers after initial communication 5. Do NOT try to contact me on Skype, I ignore the requests if you are not on my list already 6. Requires 10+ positive relative experience with project budgets over $1000 7. Do NOT send me unrelated portfolio links, send me only related links 8. Here is the priority country list; Turkey, Ukraine, Bulgaria, Romania, Estonia (Sorry, no India) Go ahead and bid please, good luck.
